title: Wings of Boden
description: Have you taken care of your wings today? 4 out of 5 doctors recommend preening twice a day and conditioning your feathers with Dr. Danyell's Feather Gloss; The preferred choice of angels since 2065. Pamper yourself and shine. Earth is now home to a population of angels. They had arrived after the storm of earthquakes and volcanoes forced the humans away.But they are not your typical angels. They are hunted. Yet life goes on in the angelic cities and towns of the world. For now.Elleria Marie Soepheea (Elle) is a typical teen with typical issues: Goals, dreams, romance, fashion and college. She just happens to be an angel.Drekavac spirits torment the angels, and giant vultures hunt them at night. Yet life goes on ... Elle has her favorite stores, frozen yogurt and coffee shops, and loves to spend time with her boyfriend and her quirky sister, the cake addict, Angelica Marie (Angie). Elle begins to realize the depth of her purpose is much deeper than fashion, friends and fun. She is on a path to change the world. But how can a teen angel manage such responsibility? The answers crawl out of the dark, and a question enters her mind: Do humans actually exist? Her scientist boyfriend, Vyn, is on the verge of a discovery (if he can survive long enough) that could even the odds with the hunters and give the mythical humans a fighting chance.Wings of Boden: Volume #1 in the Elleria Soepheea seriesPaperback available at Amazon. http://www.amazon.com/dp/061563088XEbook available here or in all formats at smashwords https://www.smashwords.com/books/view...
author: E.S. Lehman
